title: Was ‘Stalking’ Mountain Lion Actually Protecting Her Cubs?
subtitle: "This is not fun," the Utah hiker said breathlessly as he was followed by a cougar for six harrowing minutes.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A video of a “stalking” mountain lion that went viral in October 2020 showed a mother lioness protecting her cubs after a hiker came across her den in Utah.
